meanings.sent1: The prestructured schedule helped us plan our day efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The prestructured report followed a clear outline.
meanings.sent3: The prestructured picnic had everything ready before we arrived.
meanings.sent4: Her prestructured mind worked like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The prestructured puzzle made it easy to put together.

meanings.definition: Having a predetermined structure or format
meanings.sent1: The prestructured document was easy to follow.
meanings.sent2: The prestructured website had a user-friendly layout.
meanings.sent3: The prestructured party had a surprise twist at the end.
meanings.sent4: His prestructured speech captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The prestructured building stood out among the rest.
